get.description: Get the list of Twitch Drops for Fortnite

parameters.description: Allows you to filter on a specific status. By default, all drops will be returned. Filter on "ACTIVE" to get only the current drops.
parameters.name: status

parameters.name: available

parameters.name: renderData

parameters.description: Set to true if you want to get the render data for each display asset
parameters.name: includeRenderData

parameters.description: Allows you to customize the list of fields to return for each cosmetics (comma separated)
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: Date of the shop (available from Jan 1st 2022) - Format: yyyy-mm-dd
parameters.name: date

parameters.description: Set to true if you want to include the tabs hidden in the game
parameters.name: includeHiddenTabs
